attributes.title: Needs to be taken off the App Store
attributes.review: This is a terrible app it needs to be taken off the App Store this president is doing ridiculous things and he does not deserve a nap if I could I would get this zero stars he does not listen to our voices so why should we vote for him so please Apple take this off the app store

attributes.title: Trump has no jams 🧚🏼✨🧚🏼‍♂️❤️😌
attributes.review:
I downloaded the app just to open it and see a nakey 😡picture of our amazing 😌 president. I was completely terrified and went into shock right after.  ......so.....🙂 I would definitely NOT recommend this app if you don’t want your eyes to be punished😔.
This app did not pass the 🦋✨vibe check✨🦋

attributes.title: Worst app YET!!!
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrendous! It crashed my phone and barely even opened! If I could give zero stars I would. I recommended not getting this app at all, there is no reason and provides nothing. Unless you just wanna crash your phone and have to restart it.👎

attributes.title: NO
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i WANTED to support our president again. But, he hasn’t done anything that has made me want to do so. He threatens people on twitter, it has also been proven that he assulted young girls and has a strong sexual feeling towards his daughter. This app is disgusting and should be taken down immediately

attributes.title: It all started with the orange
attributes.review: So this man is our president and I’m not happy so will procede to write this bad review and one star because I don’t like him he’s a bad man and is thinking about deleting TikTok no sir gen z is probably the most powerful generation our world will ever see and not going to let some racist orange take away my safe place

attributes.title: Worst App ever!
attributes.review: Never have I downloaded such a disgusting app in my life! 😱🤢 This app is full of lies and let’s be real, why does a president need its own app? 🙄🤔 This app has caused me brain damage with its lies it’s hiding. 😶😴 Someone please tell me how this app is better than any news source, it’s just disgraceful to this country and isnt doing any justice. 🤥😓

attributes.title: SCARY🧚🏻‍♀️🥳🤪🥵
attributes.review: i got this app to support our lovely pr3sid3nt🧚🏻‍♀️but later that night I was talking about how maybe i should vote blue when the orange head says through my phone “if you do imma get ya” like a scenario straight out of horror movies i quickly go to the app and it says that it has all my information truly terrifying

attributes.title: Oranges 🍊
attributes.review: I kid you not as soon as I downloaded the app and opened it all my apples turned into oranges and started haunting me. Then my pet ant got out of her cage and started eating the oranges. I tried to stop her but then she pushed out the way!! 😨 THEN I saw the president at my door and HE came in a ate my oranges as well. 100% do not recommend!! Your oranges will be eaten!!!

attributes.title: Found out his tan was really cheeto dust😖
attributes.review: I picked this app because🐷 if we are going to continue to have an oversized cheeto🧚🏾‍♀️ as a president🦄 i needed to be aware🤩but then i find out he’s not a natural cheeto☀️😬i feel hurt and lied to for so many years😪🤧also he supports animal abuse🌈like he straps ferrets to his head💕and i cannot let this go unjust🥺so peace cheeto man app🤗✌🏾

attributes.title: I was only a kid.
attributes.review: Um very confused thought this was just an app to lock up innocent people with melanin in their skin but these very righteous, sexist, racist, and obviously law abiding ,white old men began asking for pictures of my feet and when I would say no and explain why they just kept calling me a snowflake! Very confused are terms reversed up north; it’s summer 1/5 stars!!
